attributes.action: Create a free national online student support system based on the national curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
when our schools are failing our children we turn to private companies who charge up to £3000 to provide us with learning resources (i.e student support centre)in order that our children may excel. surely these resources should be free to all and thus greatly improving the country, the education and the economy as a whole. More importantly our children will not be forgotten in an education sysytem which allows the weak to fall behind..
please sign this petition and give free student support for 3-18 year olds throughout the country.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
